title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\VpnGatewayVpnGatewayInterface
name: VpnGatewayVpnGatewayInterface
description:
A VPN gateway interface.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.VpnGatewayVpnGatewayInterface

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.id
params.description: The numeric ID of this VPN gateway interface.

params.name: data.interconnect_attachment
params.description: URL of the interconnect attachment resource. When the value of this field is present, the VPN Gateway will be used for IPsec-encrypted Cloud Interconnect; all Egress or Ingress traffic for this VPN Gateway interface will go through the specified interconnect attachment resource. Not currently available in all Interconnect locations.

params.name: data.ip_address
params.description: [Output Only] The external IP address for this VPN gateway interface.
